name: Ruu's Goblin Quest
description:
A friend of mine said "Hey, I'm gonna run a game jam." So I saw the perfect opportunity to meme on her. 😈

This is a short, combat heavy adventure - it should take you about 30 minutes to play through. This was more an excuse to experiment with some new plugins, rather than a full fledged game. But since we put in the work to build it, we thought it would be good to share it in case someone enjoyed playing!

Change Log

v1.0.0

  • Initial Release!
